mods.note: —¥C.B. 1892 (7) NOTIFICATION HO. 7 TO C.B. II ARABIA INTELLIGENCE REPORT _ I The attached copies of:- State of Report dated Aug., 1938 Revised Pages la,25,26,35,40,51,57,59-64, 74,79,80,87,99 and 102-105.., dated July, 1938 Revised Plans 2,5,11,15 dated Jan., 1937 New Plans 17,18 and 20-22 dated Jan., 1937 are to he embodied in C.B The obsolete matter (State of Report dated Sept., 1937 and Pages la,25,26,35,40,51,57,59-64,74,79,80, 87,99 and 102-105 dated prior to July, 1938, and Plans 2,5, 11,15, dated prior to Jan., 1937) is to be destroyed by fire.A.-4.' SUPPLY NOTE. *j( 1 4oor Title Kotil'ic»tl«n i<Oi 7 'ta SUPPLIED How many copies Copy numbers 11 C.B. number 1&98 ( 7 ) (1) Ship issue DISPOSAL (2) Destroyed (3) Returned to Admiralty Copy No. Ship Copy No. Date Ship In force On receipt. N.B.—The following document is hereby superseded and all copies, including those in loan libraries, should be destroyed:— BY COMMAND OF THEIR LORDSHIPS, Supplied to India Office FOR USE BY DISTRIBUTING AUTHORITY. Date received Remarks. Date disposal reptd. to Admiralty

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file refers to an Admiralty report entitled 'Arabia Intelligence Report'. The file records the India Office's receipt of a copy of the report in October 1938; it contains a supply note and a notification slip with brief details regarding the extent of the report, which according to the notification slip was written between January 1937 and August 1938. Also included are instructions on the disposal of 'obsolete matter' contained within the report. The report itself is not included. A handwritten note suggests that surviving parts of the report were filed elsewhere shortly after its receipt.The file includes a divider which gives a list of correspondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
